subject: Delay Order
description_text:
Hi i have ordered the Simsonn Plus X Racing Simulation Pedal and i have no news about them
Order number #SSN5401

conversations.body_text: Hi Stavros Sarikas,  We apologize for the delay. Two shipments destined for our German warehouse have been affected by heavy snowfall in Europe, causing road blockages and delivery delays. We will expedite delivery or explore alternative logistics channels to ship your order from China as soon as possible. Compensation will be provided based on the delay after your order is completed. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.
